And by buying direct from Pragmatic =
Programmers, you'll return more  
money back to the author.  From having ta=
lked to a couple authors,  
the royalty is a generous percentage of what Pr=
agmatic Programmers  
gets for the book -- whether that's directly from the=
 Pragmatic  
Bookshelf (i.e., "full" price) or whatever Amazon paid (i.e., =
very  
much less since they're still taking a margin, too, after offering  =

that "discount" price to you).  The PDFs from them are simply  
terrific a=
nd if you get in on one of their "Beta Books" it can be  
amazing how the c=
ontent grows (and errors, typos, etc. are fixed).

-Rob
